attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE
attributes.review:
This app RUINED MY LIFE! I absolutely hate it and I mean HATE IT!!! I just downloaded the app after I got home from shopping and LITERALLY AFTER I downloaded it my phone started to glitch, then I went to Apple to get my phone fixed and guess what they said?! â€œMiss, nothing is wrong will your phone.â€ Later that week I was checking out the app and you would NOT believe what happened, as I was trying how to figure out how to use it I would get adds about FEET PICS DRESSED AS TRUMP!  EACH TOE WAS DRESSED AS A TRUMP FAMILY MEMBER!!! Then a few weeks later I would get text messages saying â€œyouâ€™re unamericanâ€.

Now this is only the beginning how the app ruined my life!!!! Me and my boyfriend were eating lunch and we kept hearing some whispering in our bedroom. What made it scary was that itâ€™s just me and him at the house. Later that night we went to bed and heard the whispering again, but this time we heard what it was saying. It kept changing â€œTrump, Trump, Trumpâ€ over and over!! I WAS ABSOLUTELY PETRIFIED!!!

I got a priest to come over my house and bless it but he said there is a spirit haunting your app!!! I tried to delete it but I canâ€™t now Iâ€™m stuck with this haunted app!! But my boyfriend Brad said letâ€™s just buy a new phone, so I did and guess what?! That haunted app is still on my phone.

I just accepted it. But now all the flags outside my house explode and i can not tell you how many times my bushes caught on fire. A few weeks later I woke up and saw written on my walls â€œMake America White Againâ€ and I was like um mr ghost donâ€™t you mean make America great again??? No response... a month later I kept receiving a flag, The Manny flag! 

After I put the manny flag up in my front yard the trump supporter ghost left! Ty manny! DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP
